name: Run The Ruins
description:
In a last ditch effort AJ is trying to escape the dreadful  planet and go back to earth, but it is a long journey filled  with all sorts of dangerous obstacles.

Controls:

Keyboard:

Walk: (WASD) or Arrow Keys

Jump: Space

Controller:

Move: Left Stick

Jump: A Button (Xbox)

            X Button (PS)

NOTE: for better experience use controller.

Game Modified Features:

- Change Camera Angle (Isometric)

- Completely original character model with projected light beneath to aim jumping.

- Custom Textures for environmental elements such as floors walls.

- Custom models for environmental elements: Goal Post, Life Pickup, Checkpoints

- Original "Boss" enemy type with original model

- 3 levels and final stage.

Credits:

Game based on assets provided by Michigan State University and Professor Brian Winn.
